reasoning: Hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) incidence from GLOBOCAN 2002 data (closest to 2005): ~10.8 per 100k globally. Geographic variation is substantial: <2 per 100k in North America/Europe versus >20 per 100k in East Asia and sub-Saharan Africa due to hepatitis B and C prevalence.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
